mapper.select:
select * from dinky_plugin_marketing a
1=1
and `name` like concat('%',#{param.name},'%')
and `plugin_id` like concat('%',#{param.pluginId},'%')
and `plugin_download_url` like concat('%',#{param.pluginDownloadUrl},'%')
and `plugin_local_storage_full_path` like concat('%',#{param.pluginLocalStorageFullPath},'%')
and `organization` like concat('%',#{param.organization},'%')
and `repository_id` like concat('%',#{param.repositoryId},'%')
and `description` like concat('%',#{param.description},'%')
and `group_id` like concat('%',#{param.groupId},'%')
and `artifact_id` like concat('%',#{param.artifactId},'%')
and `current_version` like concat('%',#{param.currentVersion},'%')
and `installed` = #{param.installed}
and `downloaded` = #{param.downloaded}
and plugin_release_timestamp >= str_to_date( #{param.pluginReleaseTimestamp},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and create_time >= str_to_date( #{param.createTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and update_time >= str_to_date( #{param.updateTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and
${ew.sqlSegment}
